author: kfogel
msg: Follow up to r27982 with various cleanups and tweaks, as well as some
comments (search for "###") that are effectively review questions.
I thought just committing comments would be more efficient for
everyone than following up to the commit email with questions, since
the commit email still reflects the original commit, which is getting
more and more out-of-date with the branch's content.
(index_path_mergeinfo): Doc string tweaks, including one fix to the
standard way, and check the result of strcmp in our standard way.
into active voice and specifying boundary condition behaviors.
Rename the two 'parent_' variables to better reflect their meaning.
Format parameters in the standard way; check the result of strcmp
in our standard way too.  Fix some indentation problems.  Remove
unused variable sqlite_result.  Add a "###" comment.
"*" along the edge of the doc string.
(schema_create_sql): Use above new constant for the two identical
strings, since these two functions implement well-known RA
interfaces and we typically don't document in that circumstance.
strings, for same reasons as above in libsvn_ra_neon.
between the declarations and the start of the real code.  Add some
"###" comments about code duplication and error case checking.
Don't use the assignment-result-as-conditional idiom in one place,
since we didn't use it in similar code preceding that place.
note tells us to.  Also, remove comma from after the last element.
